thread.title: BRIEF-Cobalt 27 Announces Upsize To Previously Announced Private Placement Offering

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cobalt 27 Announces Upsize To Previously Announced Private Placement Offering
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Cobalt 27 Capital Corp:
* COBALT 27 ANNOUNCES UPSIZE TO PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED STRATEGIC PRIVATE PLACEMENT OFFERING TO $185 MILLION
* COBALT 27 CAPITAL CORP - ‍WILL ISSUE UP TO 16.2 MILLION COMMON SHARES AT A PRICE OF $11.40 PER COMMON SHARE​
* COBALT 27 CAPITAL - ‍NET PROCEEDS OF OFFERING WILL BE USED TO FUND ACQUISITION OF COBALT-RELATED STREAMS AND ROYALTIES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
